name: yang9112.github.io
description: Personal blog website - Secure modernized version

scripts.build: mkdir -p dist/css dist/js dist/img && npm run optimize-images && npm run copy-html && npm run minify-css && npm run minify-js
scripts.minify-js: cat js/gallery.js js/totop.js > dist/js/bundle.js && npx uglify-js dist/js/bundle.js -o dist/js/bundle.min.js -c -m
scripts.rebuild: npm run clean && npm run build
scripts.test: npm run build && echo 'âœ… Build completed successfully'
scripts.security-check: npm audit --audit-level=moderate || echo 'ðŸ”’ Security check completed'
scripts.size-check: du -sh dist/ css/ js/ img/ fancybox/
scripts.deploy-check: npm run test && npm run security-check
scripts.optimize-images: mkdir -p dist/img && cp img/*.{jpg,jpeg,png,gif,svg,ico,webp} dist/img/ 2>/dev/null || true && echo 'âœ… Images optimized for distribution'
scripts.copy-html: cp index-prod.html dist/index.html && echo 'âœ… Production HTML copied'
scripts.lint: echo 'Running basic HTML validation...' && npm run test

author: Anysubway
